programme.title: ANAK BAND - EP 20
programme.desc: Cahaya, who was trading with his vegetable cart, felt like he got a durian collapse when suddenly Gilang, the vocalist of The Junas, Cahaya's favorite band, ran up to Cahaya asking for help so that Cahaya helped him avoid the pursuit of his fans. Light, who was kind and always optimistic, happily helped Gilang hide. Once safe, Gilang came out of hiding and thanked Light. Light was very happy because it turned out that Gilang was very friendly.

programme.title: Lord Permak Cinta Sat Set Ke Pelaminan
programme.desc: A beautiful girl named Ayu. It is told that Ayu in her daily life works as a traveling dressmaker. That is by using a motorcycle. Ayu is always happy with her independence and simplicity. But suddenly Ayu's life was disturbed by the presence of a handsome boy named Riza. It was told that Riza had to attend a meeting that day. But suddenly his pants were torn, it made him insecure and look for a tailor who was open early in the morning.

Rama always causes trouble and annoys Dea, as he, now a goat herder, constantly interrupts her while she teaches. Since meeting Dea, Rama's life has started to improve, and he is becoming a disciplined man. Will Rama fall in love with Dea?

programme.title: Thirai Flix - EP 1
programme.desc: An entertainment-based programme.

programme.desc: One World, Four Stories. Namadhu is a human drama with simple emotions and subtle sensibilities. It follows the journey of four people at different phases in their life: childhood, youth, and adulthood. And how, in this small world, the choices we make often intersect and collide with the paths of others, creating endless ripples that change us forever.

programme.title: Les 100 Lieux Qu'il Faut Voir - EP 3
programme.desc: Even far from Metropolitan France, there is no shortage of fascinating French heritage to be by women who know and love these lands, between lagoons and atolls discovered. We go island-hopping to explore the history of the Polynesian people, a journey guided.

programme.title: TV5 Monde, Le Journal

programme.title: Pauline Grandeur Nature
programme.desc: Pauline, separated, tries to balance motherhood and work as a landscape designer. Her life becomes even more complicated when her mother announces she's moving abroad and won't be able to help any more. So when she's finally given a major project to manage, a total burnout is on the horizon...

programme.title: L'americain
programme.desc: To stave off boredom and make himself the centre of attention, Malik tells three local youngsters that he's leaving to live in the USA. It isn't true, but once the news has spread around the neighbourhood, he becomes a symbol of hope and pride for everyone.

programme.title: L'attente
programme.desc: Jeanne and Celine are at the maternity clinic for the arrival of their first child. It's Jeanne who is going to give birth. During the night, in the hospital entrance hall, Celine meets two men who, like her... are waiting.

programme.title: Les Pays D'en Haut - EP 1
programme.desc: Seraphin is in a critical condition following the shooting that took place during the inauguration of the Sainte-Adele station. Several of the villagers had reasons to hate him, but Bidou eventually becomes considered the prime suspect.

programme.title: Les Pays D'en Haut - EP 2
programme.desc: Two new suspects: Siffleux and Delima, his former lover. Despite his fragile health, Seraphin makes the most of the drought in Sainte-Adele to invest and become even richer. Bishop Fabre removes Father Caron from the parish, triggering a wave of protest.

programme.title: Version Francaise - EP 2
programme.desc: We head off to the Fine Arts Museum in Libourne. Deep dive into sculptor Hugo Servanin's library of bodies and engineering laboratory. Danish designer Cecilie Bahnsen: combining Scandinavian pragmatism with French know-how. Discovery: digital light embroidery by Lou de Pray.

programme.title: Leo En Jouant « Dans La Compagnie Des Hommes »
programme.desc: Two powerful men are at war and are settling their scores through the gunfire of stock options, financial plots and takeovers. Leonard is the son of one of these businessmen and wants to prove his abilities. We also meet an heir, two kings, a chamberlain, a madman and a commoner.

programme.title: Wilder - EP 1
programme.desc: Five years earlier during a police operation, Volker had been responsible for young Soufiane falling to his death from a balcony. _x000D_Present day. Police officer Volker dies the same way as Soufiane, by falling from a great height, apparently with a helping hand from someone.

programme.title: Wilder - EP 2
programme.desc: Five years earlier, police officer Gerry Engler killed a young man with an iron. _x000D_Present day. Engler is found in a park, his head covered in blood: Martin Jesch had killed him with an axe...

programme.title: La Peinture Francaise Autour Du Monde - EP 8
programme.desc: A museum of fine arts located in Pasadena, north-east of Los Angeles, the Norton Simon Museum offers an impressive collection of European paintings. The impressionist trend is notably represented by Corot, Courbet, Morisot, Pissarro, Manet, Monet, Renoir, Degas...

programme.title: Concours Reine Elisabeth Piano 2025 - Concert De Cloture
programme.desc: Concert by the three winners of the Piano Session Competition: the Dutch Nikola Meeuwsen (1st prize), the Japanese Wataru Hisasue (2nd prize) and the Belgian Valere Burnon (3rd prize and Musiq3 Audience Prize), accompanied by the Antwerp Symphony Orchestra, conducted by Marc Albrecht. On the programme: Beethoven, Grieg and Chopin.

programme.title: Transforming Business
programme.desc: Data centers are worsening global water scarcity. As tech giants like Google, Amazon, and Microsoft ramp up computing power for AI and cloud services, their facilities are consuming enormous amounts of water and electricity. This video explores examples from Uruguay, Chile, the US, and Sweden to reveal the staggering water demands of data centers - and the local conflicts tthey’re sparking.

As tech giants like Google, Amazon, and Microsoft ramp up computing power for AI and cloud services, their facilities are consuming enormous amounts of water and electricity. This video explores examples from Uruguay, Chile, the US, and Sweden to reveal the staggering water demands of data centers - and the local conflicts tthey’re sparking.

programme.title: Movie - Chinna Goundar
programme.desc: The village head is a man who sticks to honesty while making judgements. However, when he falls prey to a conspiracy, he bravely fights to ensure that justice prevails in his village.

programme.title: Movie - Don Seenu
programme.desc: Seenu has only one ambition and that is to become a don. He joins hands with one of the city's mafia kingpins and gains his trust, but is caught in a fix when he goes on a mission to Germany.

programme.title: Movie - Enn Idhaya Rani
programme.desc: A woman realises she is pregnant after she divorces her husband for having an affair. Many years later, her husband enters her life, eager to reunite with her.

programme.title: Movie - Ennai Paar Yogam Varum
programme.desc: Jagadeshwari's marriage gets called off, and her father dies from shock. She vows to take revenge upon Jaga, the man who caused the misfortune.

programme.title: Fillers
programme.desc: KTV HD presents you round-the-clock Kollywood movies, from the latest blockbusters to classics of the yesteryear!

programme.title: Movie - Sooran
programme.desc: Sadha, a womaniser who is involved in various criminal activities, visits Saravanan's hometown pretending to be his friend. When the latter leaves the village, he gets embroiled in gang wars.

programme.title: Movie - Thangam
programme.desc: Thangam, a landlord, dearly loves his sister. When Arusamy rapes his sister, Thangam is forced to let him marry her. When his sister is killed despite all his sacrifices, he vows to avenge her death.

programme.title: Movie - Sakalakala Vallavan
programme.desc: Kamal's sister is raped by the village head's son when the former refuses to abide by his dictatorship. Kamal vows to seek revenge and get his sister married to her rapist.

programme.title: Movie - Makkal Aanaiyittal
programme.desc: Kadhiravan and his friend Mohan fight against the atrocities of a corrupt politician. When Mohan gets killed, Kadhiravan plots revenge against the politician and his men.

programme.title: Movie - Citizen
programme.desc: Abdulla, a mechanic, kidnaps three prominent government officials. Sarojini is a CBI officer who investigates this matter and tries to piece together the clues left behind by the kidnapper.

programme.title: Movie - Adhe Neram Adhe Idam
programme.desc: Kartik and Janani love each other, but Kartik's father insists that he should get settled financially before moving forward. Kartik goes to Australia for a year and befriends Siva, who happens to be engaged to Janani.

programme.title: Movie - Ennavoo Pudichirukku
programme.desc: Santosh swears revenge on a woman named Sangeetha who slapped him after rejecting his advances. However, his quest for vengeance gets complicated when he learns that Sangeetha is his brother's lover.

programme.title: Movie - Eri Karai Poongatru
programme.desc: Yerikkarai Poongatre is a Tamil feature film starring Pallavi.

programme.title: Fillers
programme.desc: KTV HD presents you round-the-clock Kollywood movies, from the latest blockbusters to classics of the yesteryear!

programme.title: Movie - Pooparika Varugirom
programme.desc: Aravind and Priya love each other, but Priya refuses to marry him due to an unpleasant incident that happened at her sister's wedding. Arvind's grandfather steps in to resolve the problem.

programme.title: Movie - Melmaruvathur Arpudhangal
programme.desc: A God-fearing woman gets married to a man who is equally religious. However, her life turns upside down when her husband accuses her of being unfaithful.

programme.title: Movie - Oor Mariyadhai
programme.desc: Rathnavelu loves Rasathi, who is in love with Kannan, brother of Veerapandi, an arch-rival of Velu. She is forcefully married to Velu, which invites the death of Kannan and the revenge of his brother.

programme.title: Movie - Kannamoochi Enada
programme.desc: Harish, a software engineer in Singapore, falls in love with Swathi. However, her father, a police commissioner, instantly rejects Harish after learning a few disturbing facts about him.

programme.title: Movie - Jayam
programme.desc: A young woman's marriage is arranged with her first cousin by her parents during her childhood, but she falls in love with another guy. When the parents fix her marriage with the cousin, she elopes with her lover.

programme.title: Hologic WTA Tour 2025
programme.desc: The Canadian Open is a prestigious professional tennis tournament held annually in Montreal and Toronto. The tournament alternates between Montreal and Toronto each year. Toronto’s Sobeys Stadium holds 12,500 tennis fans, while Montreal’s IGA Stadium holds 11,500.It is the second-oldest active tennis tournament in the world.

programme.title: ASO Marathon Programming 2025
programme.desc: The Paris Marathon is an annual marathon hosted by the city of Paris, France. It is the largest running event in France in terms of finishers and is typically among the five largest marathons in the world.[2] The marathon begins along the Champs-Élysées, runs southeast through the city to the Bois de Vincennes, heads back through the city along the River Seine, and finishes on Avenue Foch.

programme.desc: Co-founded by Arthur Ashe, Donald Dell, and John A. Harris, the Mubadala Citi DC Open in Washington, DC, is one of the oldest and most prestigious tournaments in tennis. Held annually in Rock Creek Park since its founding, the Mubadala Citi DC Open is also the longest-running pro tennis event to be held in an equal-access public park.

programme.title: Heroines 2025
programme.desc: Heroines is a new, timeless series, that tables important discussion that challenges the status quo and celebrates the unique values of women’s sport. programme.title: REVIEW - MON 05 MAY
programme.desc: Highlights of every Matchweek 35 fixture, including Friday's opener as Manchester City take on Wolves, Arsenal hosting Bournemouth, and Crystal Palace facing Nottingham Forest to close out the gameweek.

programme.title: MATCH HIGHLIGHTS 24/25 MW35 Chelsea v Liverpool
programme.desc: Each Premier League game from the 2024/25 season condensed into an individual 26-minute highlights show.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 9
programme.desc: Newcastle United are a team on the rise under Eddie Howe; a manager quietly rewriting the modern history of the club. With exclusive access and interviews from inside St. James' Park, we uncover the transformation Howe has led, from stabilising the team to delivering silverware and reigniting belief on Tyneside. As the Magpies set their sights on even greater heights, we ask just how far he can take this ambitious, resurgent club.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 7
programme.desc: We sit down with Bruno Guimarães to trace his remarkable journey from the streets of Brazil to Premier League stardom with Newcastle United. Travelling back to South America, we meet the family, friends, and coaches who shaped his early years and believed in his dream. Bruno opens up about the sacrifices, setbacks, and defining moments that fuelled his rise, offering a heartfelt look at the person behind the player.

programme.title: PL BEST OF... THE PREMIER LEAGUE HALL OF FAME
programme.desc: An action-packed hour featuring legendary Hall of Fame icons, including Ashley Cole, Andy Cole, Tony Adams, Peter Schmeichel, Paul Scholes, Thierry Henry, Alan Shearer, and Frank Lampard

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 3
programme.desc: With 208 goals in 491 top flight appearances, Wayne Rooney is widely regarded as one of the best strikers to have played in the League. programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 6
programme.desc: He scored 104 Premier League goals, making 55 assists in 254 English top flight matches for Chelsea. It's no wonder then that four time Premier League winner Didier Drogba has earned a seat amongst the top table elite, after being inducted into the Premier League Hall of Fame. We talk to him and those that knew him best about what set him apart from others in the game, reflecting on his incredible career and his lasting legacy.

Bruno opens up about the sacrifices, setbacks, and defining moments that fuelled his rise, offering a heartfelt look at the person behind the player.

programme.title: REVIEW OF THE SEASON - 2024/2025 (LIV)
programme.desc: Relive another extraordinary Premier League campaign as Liverpool soared to an historic 20th league title, Nottingham Forest defied expectations and the promoted sides were strenuously challenged. There were also tactical transformations, shifts in narrative trends, and a more open field than ever before. Review of the Season documents all of the thrilling stories to emerge across the 380 matches.

programme.desc: An action-packed hour featuring legendary Hall of Fame icons, including Ashley Cole, Andy Cole, Tony Adams, Peter Schmeichel, Paul Scholes, Thierry Henry, Alan Shearer, and Frank Lampard

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 4
programme.desc: Now an Arsenal Legend, Ian Wright nearly walked away from the game after being rejected for a string of trials as a youngster. But here he tells us how he not only made it to the top, but how he carved his name into Arsenal folklore and became one of only 16 footballers to be inducted into the Premier League Hall of Fame.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 3
programme.desc: We celebrate the greatest goalscorers in Premier League history; the icons whose instinct, power, and flair have lit up stadiums and etched their names into footballing folklore. From Alan Shearer's relentless consistency to Thierry Henry's elegance, Sergio Aguero's killer instinct to Harry Kane's rise, we relive the moments that defined an era.

programme.title: THE ART OF... - EP 2
programme.desc: Chelsea legend Frank Lampard joins former England teammate Owen Hargreaves to examine exactly what it takes to become an elite central midfielder.

programme.title: FS MMA Tama Chan vs. Jan Finney
programme.desc: BodogFIGHT features classic MMA matches involving some of your favorite fighters! Jan "Cuddles" Finney faces off against Tama Chan where Finney looks to put the squeeze on Japan's Tama Chan in Costa Rica.

programme.title: MEGA Fights Shane Mosley vs. Luis Collazo
programme.desc: MEGA Fights are premiere events from the sport of boxing including HBO World Championship Boxing and historic PPV events plus past, current and future World Champions. This episode features welterweights 'Sugar' Shane Mosley (43-4, 37 KOs) and Luis Collazo (27-2, 13 KOs) fighting over the interim WBC title. This fight took place at the Mandalay Bay Resort and Casino in Las Vegas, Nevada, USA, on February 10, 2007.

programme.title: BWF Martial Arts
programme.desc: This episode features highlights from the Men's Weapons as well as Girl's Forms and Team Demo highlights.

programme.title: Wide World of Fights Jonathon Banks vs. Seth Mitchell
programme.desc: Wide World Of Fights includes all styles of fighting from around the world in one show! This episode features a heavyweight battle that ends in a curious decision between Jonathon Banks and Seth Mitchell , as well as kickboxing, sumo, arm wrestling and more!

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Amir Khan vs. Marcos Maidana
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is Amir Khan defending the WBA light welterweight title against Marcos Maidana in a bout that earned 2010 Fight of the Year honors from the Boxing Writers Association of America. Also on the card, a young Adrien Broner showcases his skills.

programme.title: FS Grand Sumo
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. This new format presents Sumo in an authentic, in-depth and entertaining way covering the rules, ranks, match-ups, and more. Episode 5, from Ryogoku Kokugikan. in Tokyo, Japan, features Takayasu, Takakeisho, Mitakeumi and Terunofuji.

programme.title: Karate 1 Premier League
programme.desc: Dublin, Ireland welcomes one of the most anticipated events in Martial Arts this year as the Karate 1 Premier League returns. This will be the first Karate 1 Premier League event to take place in Dublin, with many of the top competitors in the world making the journey to Ireland for the first time and where the new Grand Winners will be crowned.

programme.title: MMA:30
programme.desc: This episode features two-time UFC champion and Hall of Famer Randy "The Natural" Couture and his buddies firing up their motorcycles for a good cause, plus an interview with one of MMA's biggest stars, "Rowdy" Ronda Rousey. We've got another installment of the gun store challenge this time with Thiago Alves, plus we go behind the scenes for a photo shoot with ring girl Arianny Celeste, exclusively on FIGHT SPORTS.

programme.title: WCCB Dina Thorslund vs. Seren Cetin
programme.desc: WBC & WBO Women's Bantamweight World Champion Dina Thorslund puts her titles and undefeated record on the line in front of her hometown fans at the Royal Arena in Copenhagen, Denmark, taking on top contender and undefeated challenger Seren Cetin of Turkey. Thorslund has held World Championship gold for over five years, including seven defenses of the WBO World Title before adding the WBC Championship in September.

programme.title: American Ninja Warrior
programme.desc: Dozens of contestants brave the cold and thin air to compete on a redesigned course, featuring new obstacles: the Cat Grab and Spikes Into Cargo!

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Floyd Mayweather vs. Juan Manuel Marquez
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is Floyd Mayweather's return to boxing after a 21-month retirement. He takes on Juan Manuel Marquez in a fight that saw 1 million pay-per-view buys for a revenue of $52 million. Also on the card, action from a young Sergey Kovalev.

programme.title: FS Grand Sumo
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. Episode 1, from Ryogoku Kokugikan in Tokyo, Japan, features Takakeisho, Daieisho, Ichinojo and Mitakeumi.

programme.title: Fight Quest
programme.desc: Episode 7: Mexico City, Mexico - Hosts Jimmy Smith and Doug Anderson learn the Fight Discipline of Boxing and the Martial Art of Hands with Masters Igancio Nacho" Beristain and Tiburcio Garcia."

programme.title: FIGHT SPORTS MMA Garreth McLellan vs. Dricus Du Plessis
programme.desc: Check out exciting action from MMA organizations around the world. programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Floyd Mayweather vs. Juan Manuel Marquez
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is Floyd Mayweather's return to boxing after a 21-month retirement. He takes on Juan Manuel Marquez in a fight that saw 1 million pay-per-view buys for a revenue of $52 million. Also on the card, action from a young Sergey Kovalev.

programme.title: FS Grand Sumo
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. This new format presents Sumo in an authentic, in-depth and entertaining way covering the rules, ranks, match-ups, and more. Episode 1, from Ryogoku Kokugikan in Tokyo, Japan, features Takakeisho, Daieisho, Ichinojo and Mitakeumi.

programme.title: Fight Quest
programme.desc: Episode 7: Mexico City, Mexico - Hosts Jimmy Smith and Doug Anderson learn the Fight Discipline of Boxing and the Martial Art of Hands with Masters Igancio Nacho" Beristain and Tiburcio Garcia."

programme.title: FIGHT SPORTS MMA Garreth McLellan vs. Dricus Du Plessis
programme.desc: Check out exciting action from MMA organizations around the world. This episode features coverage of mixed martial arts in South Africa including two fighters duke it out for the EFC Worldwide Middleweight Championship in Garreth "Soldier Boy" McLellan vs. Dricus "Stillknocks" Du Plessis. Bonus coverage includes Texier Kabesa vs. Luke Michael from Durban, South Africa.

programme.title: WCCB Dina Thorslund vs. Seren Cetin
programme.desc: WBC & WBO Women's Bantamweight World Champion Dina Thorslund puts her titles and undefeated record on the line in front of her hometown fans at the Royal Arena in Copenhagen, Denmark, taking on top contender and undefeated challenger Seren Cetin of Turkey. Thorslund has held World Championship gold for over five years, including seven defenses of the WBO World Title before adding the WBC Championship in September.

programme.title: WCCB David Benavidez vs. Demetrius Andrade
programme.desc: From the Michelob Ultra Arena in Las Vegas, two undefeated Super Middleweights square off when David Benavidez meets Demetrius Andrade for the WBC Interim World Championship. Benavidez is 27-0, with a list of impressive victories including a recent win over Caleb Plant to establish himself as one of the top rated fighters in the division. Andrade, the former Middleweight World Champion, is also without a loss at 32-0, and now looks to add a championship at Super Middleweight.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective S1 - EP 24
programme.desc: All the farm animals have run away from the farm and are causing chaos in Toy Green. Noddy launches his investigation and discovers that the farm gate was left open by mistake. Using his wwwbook and asking questions, Noddy follows all the clues and discovers that the Pockets left the farm gate open by mistake when they were playing with the animals. With the help of Bumpy, Revs and Big Ears, Noddy soon rounds up all the animals and returns them safely to the farm.

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service S3 - EP 24
programme.desc: Hopes are high for this evening's hoe-down on Greendale's village green - especially among PC Selby and Ted, who each harbour hopes of dancing with Dr Gilbertson. Pat's mission is to deliver one of Ted's inventions, a mechanical horse or "bucking bronco", to the event. But when the bronco is accidentally switched on in the back of Pat's van, it rolls away and Pat can't find a way to recapture it. He enlists Amy's help, but jealous Pumpkin pushes the bronco away, making matters worse.

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots S2 - EP 76
programme.desc: Fifi's trowel has gone missing. Stingo decides to take the matter in hand and launch an investigation to find the culprit.

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion S1 - EP 24
programme.desc: Ooo Ooo is having a banana party. Raa Raa and the others have picked masses of lovely bananas, but how are they going to transport them back to Ooo Ooo's in time for the party?

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go! S1 - EP 25
programme.desc: Based on PD Eastman's classic children’s book, Go, Dog. Go! Follows 6-year-old dog, Tag Barker, on her hilarious adventures in the city of Pawston, a fun-loving community of dogs on the go. Tag is a skilled mechanic and loves anything that goes. With her ingenuity and creativity, Tag can go as far as any plan will take her, always with her best friend, Scooch Pooch, by her side. Scooch’s easy-going nature is the perfect counterbalance to Tag’s high-octane energy.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal S1 - EP 25
programme.desc: Kelps learns about memory spark in an attempt to relive a memory of his grandmother. / Kelp and the underwater gang put on a show to showcase their imaginary sparks. As she practices, however, Scallop becomes convinced her tusk has a real spark!

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants S1 - EP 19
programme.desc: Captain Underpants becomes a wanted man in underwear when footage surfaces of a robber who looks exactly like him. George and Harold, positive it's an impostor, try to track down the perp and bring him to justice. But can the boys do this before Captain Underpants is found guilty?

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business S1 - EP 19
programme.desc: Boss Baby is framed for leaking info about the Stinkless Serum to PuppyCo and must flee on the run via Errand Day with the family

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree S1 - EP 6
programme.desc: Ugga has a secret - she's taking Eep to "flop with the bulrusses" - a fun and dangerous pastime Ugga enjoyed as a teen. Ugga's excitement fades when Hope invites herself and Dawn along.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City S1 - EP 9
programme.desc: It’s Chinese New Year! With Yi and Jin tied up in their respective CNY festival performances, Peng and a semi-disguised Everest hit the festive streets, eating and enjoying everything in sight. Meanwhile, while paying respects to her late father at a temple, Yi panics when an accident breaks her magical violin strings. She hurries back to find her friends, only to spot Peng and Everest and watch them get snatched up by a menacing, mysterious creature!

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS S1 - EP 6
programme.desc: Tom and the Riders try to save ICARIS when it’s revealed to be in danger from a monstrous dragon.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! S1 - EP 19
programme.desc: Poppy and Archer get lost in Troll Forest together during one of his escape attempts and must learn to trust each other/Obsessed with finding Nova Swift's next pop-up party, Guy Diamond enlists the Snack Pack to help him on the hunt

programme.title: Dew Drops Diaries S1 - EP 11
programme.desc: On Harper’s first allowance day, the pets accidentally knock Harper’s Piggy Bank over and lose one of her quarters that she was reserving to buy Nicholas an ice cream cone. Now the Dew Drops must scramble to replace it! / When the Dew Drops struggle to help their kids with tasks that are outside their usual fairy-bilities, they decide to swap kids for the day, but ultimately learn they’ re exactly where they need to be because they know their families so well!

programme.title: Dew Drops Diaries S1 - EP 12
programme.desc: Nicholas keeps stuffing oversized objects inside Eden’s fairy home. But it creates a BIG problem when Harper’s family wants to visit grandma and the car keys are nowhere to be found! / When Harper gets sick, Marcus builds a pulley between their apartments to send Harper treats. But when Qwak, the chipmunk, breaks the pulley, the Dews must step in to keep the treat train running.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go S1 - EP 15
programme.desc: When accident-prone Rodney gets hired to babysit a mischievous toddler, TZG secretly watches over their safety. / When there’s a power outage in Harmony Harbor, TZG secretly helps the townsfolk beat the blackout.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go S1 - EP 16
programme.desc: When both Sam and Gabriel pre-order the new Commander Kale comic but the supplier only sends one copy, TZG secretly ferries the comic book back and forth between readers. / When Fawna teaches a silent yoga class, TZG secretly find and remove a loud chirping cricket from the Community Center.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders S1 - EP 11
programme.desc: Burple and Winger each injure a wing while they're with Dak, and only teamwork can get them home. At the roost, Cutter gets stuck in a puddle of goo.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders S1 - EP 12
programme.desc: The Rescue Riders have a "Dragon Day" to show their skills to a young fan, but Aggro skips it to hang out with her new fun -- but reckless -- friends.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal S1 - EP 11
programme.desc: Chef J tells Ollie he cooks with love. Kelp and Ollie set out to make food with love for him. When various food combos fail, Ollie considers giving up, because it isn’t good enough. Kelp goes to his Dad for answers, and two seemingly different ingredients form something magical. / When Cruz is not his usual upbeat self, Kelp tries various ways to cheer him up before realizing the best way to be a good friend is to just sit with him, and let him feel what he’s feeling.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal S1 - EP 12
programme.desc: Kelp and Scallop pet-sit Crabby, who acts out until they realize he’s missing home. / Kelp feels like he can’t choose between a celebration on land or under the sea. So he attempts to do both... at the same time!

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free S2 - EP 37
programme.desc: Lucky rushes to complete all of last year’s resolutions before the clock strikes midnight on New Year’s Eve

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free S2 - EP 38
programme.desc: Lucky and the PALs must rescue Julian after he gets in too deep while pledging a secret society at his school

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots S2 - EP 37
programme.desc: When pirates force Puss to face his fear of water by walking the ship's plank, he is rescued by his ex-girlfriend and fish monster, Feejee the Mermaid.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots S2 - EP 38
programme.desc: When Puss and the pirates find the treasure of San Luis Rey, they must find a way to escape the attack of Bonky the Parrot and his skeleton army.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants S2 - EP 37
programme.desc: Despite being terrible at the job, Krupp wants to be the camp director again next summer. That's something Harold and George simply cannot abide.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants S2 - EP 38
programme.desc: It's parents' weekend at Lake Summer Camp, and Krupp's eager to make amends with Harold and George ... or so he says.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go! S1 - EP 19
programme.desc: With a new family moving to town, Mayor Sniffington wants Pawston to look perfect. Tag and Scooch offer to help, but it's too many chores to do on their own, so Tag builds a robot to help. But when Frank and Beans catch wind of the robot, they try to swipe it so that it will do their personal chores. \ When Tag learns that Pawston's new fire chief is a cat, she leads a welcoming effort with the dogs of Pawston.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal S1 - EP 19
programme.desc: When Kelp and Scallop discover Mr. Pearly has a cave full of stuff they help him to realize it could help a lot of other sea creatures. / When the group goes camping, Kelp helps Ollie learn that even though it didn’t go exactly as planned, they can still have loads of fun.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib S3 - EP 77
programme.desc: Boss scours Chicago to find his old co-worker nemesis Board Member Bradley, his key to cutting a deal with the Federal Agents for his freedom. However, he must lose the tail of Canada’s most notorious fugitive tracker, a trained bear cub named Henri. Meanwhile, Tina is trapped at home with her paranoid grandma Yaya, forced to prove to her that she’s not a criminal baby like the news is causing Yaya to believe.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib S3 - EP 78
programme.desc: The Templeton’s hometown is overtaken by baby criminals, with Temp Baby Aubrey in charge. Boss has 48 hours to somehow restore them all to adulthood and turn them in, or face jail time himself. With Tina now acting like a dark angel of vengeance after feeling betrayed by Aubrey, Boss is forced to assemble a team from unlikely odd friends. Together, they launch a final mission to settle old scores and clear Boss Baby’s name.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business S1 - EP 1
programme.desc: The world’s worst baby is on the loose and Boss Baby, Tim and the team must find him before he turns the whole neighborhood against babies

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree S1 - EP 8
programme.desc: Sandy is finally old enough to join Grug and Eep for the annual Daddy Daughter Day and Grug couldn’t be more excited. But when Sandy struggles to fit in with Grug and Eep’s traditions, Grug has second thoughts. It isn’t until Sandy goes missing that Grug realizes it’s time to start a new tradition.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree S1 - EP 9
programme.desc: When Phil humiliates himself playing throw-go-nut with the punch monkeys, the Croods band together to help him regain his confidence. Unfortunately, Phil goes from confident to cocky and bets the farm on a game of throw-go-nut with the punch monkeys. Can_x000D_the Croods overcome the punch monkeys - and Phil - to save the farm?

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree S1 - EP 10
programme.desc: When Gran announces it’s time to choose a new Thunder Sisters Queen, Ugga assumes she’s got it in the bag. But after a series of challenges (the Thunder Games), it becomes clear Gran might not be ready to step down.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City S1 - EP 5
programme.desc: On the brink of his highly-anticipated White Coat Ceremony at school, Jin proudly dons his new white doctor’s coat around town, unwittingly drawing the attention of a creature named Morty. After a slobbery lick from Morty, Jin turns invisible! As Jin frantically tries to become re-visible, he discovers that Morty is very pregnant! Ultimately, Jin foregoes his ceremony and instead delivers Morty’s five babies.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS S1 - EP 12
programme.desc: Tom and the riders go in search of Thunder and must face a gauntlet of dangerous dragons to find their lost friend. Along the way, Tom reveals his big secret to D’Angelo and Alex.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants S1 - EP 25
programme.desc: In part one of a two-part season finale, the Melvins create a final exam that George and Harold will be sure to fail: the Doom Dome. To ensure success, Melvinborg injects Melvin's cells with nanobots, giving him heightened powers. But when George and Harold find out, they crank the nanobots to the max, causing Melvin to grow into a giant! The boys enlist Captain Underpants to fight the jealous nerd, but their victory only loses the nanobots onto Piqua...

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective S1 - EP 25
programme.desc: Pat Pat and the pirates have fallen out over who has won board game and as they've lost the rules they can't agree. programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service S3 - EP 25
programme.desc: Everyone in Greendale is excited because pop superstar, Brad Lee is coming to Pencaster Bay to perform a concert. programme.title: The Gilded Age S3 - EP 6
programme.desc: Young Marian Brook moves from rural Pennsylvania into the New York City home of her old money aunts and gets enmeshed in a Gilded Age social war with their rich neighbours.

programme.title: Dirty Angels
programme.desc: Following the US withdrawal from Afghanistan in 2021, a group of female soldiers are sent back in to rescue a group of kidnapped teenagers.

programme.title: The Passenger
programme.desc: Randy prefers to keep to himself, but when his coworker Benson goes on a sudden and violent rampage, he is forced to face his fears and confront his troubled past to survive.

programme.title: Justice League X Rwby: Super Heroes And Huntsmen Part Two
programme.desc: On the heels of successfully escaping a deadly digital trap, the members of the Justice League emerge in their own world to discover that Grimm, ravenous creatures from Remnant, have overtaken Earth! In order to defeat the monsters, they must call on their new friends - Team RWBY - for help!

programme.title: Round And Round
programme.desc: Rachel’s stuck in a time loop, reliving the night of her parents’ Hanukkah party. Can Zach, the "nice boy" Grandma’s trying to set her up with, help her make it to tomorrow?

programme.title: The Debt
programme.desc: A former Mossad agent discovers a present truth that makes her question her past in this espionage thriller.

programme.title: Trolls Band Together
programme.desc: When Branch’s bro Floyd is kidnapped for his musical talents, Branch and Poppy embark on a harrowing and emotional journey to reunite the other brothers and rescue Floyd from a fate even worse than pop-culture obscurity.

programme.title: Over The Hedge
programme.desc: When a newly developed suburb threatens the livelihood of a group of local animals, a savvy raccoon named RJ comes to the rescue.

programme.title: Rain Man
programme.desc: A young wheeler-dealer's life is changed forever when he discovers he has an autistic savant older brother. Stars Tom Cruise and Dustin Hoffman.

programme.title: A Star Is Born
programme.desc: In this new take on the tragic love story, a seasoned musician discovers and falls in love with a struggling artiste.

programme.title: Duplicity
programme.desc: Julia Roberts and Clive Owen star as two sexy spies-turned-corporate operatives in the midst of a clandestine love affair.

programme.title: It's Complicated
programme.desc: In matters of love, divorce, and everything in between, it's, well, It's Complicated.

programme.title: Joker: Folie À Deux
programme.desc: While struggling with his dual identity, Arthur Fleck stumbles upon true love and finds the music inside him.

programme.title: Dìdi
programme.desc: A 13-year-old Taiwanese-American boy navigates his relationships with family and friends during his last summer before entering high school.

programme.title: Girls Trip
programme.desc: Four lifelong friends travel to New Orleans for the annual Essence Festival.

programme.title: The Unborn
programme.desc: A young woman is pulled into a world of nightmares when a demonic spirit haunts her and threatens everyone she loves.

programme.title: Cuckoo
programme.desc: On a trip to the German Alps with her father and stepmother, Gretchen discovers that the resort town where they’re staying hides sinister secrets.

programme.title: Rain Man
programme.desc: A young wheeler-dealer's life is changed forever when he discovers he has an autistic savant older brother. Stars Tom Cruise and Dustin Hoffman.

programme.title: Sweet Dreams
programme.desc: Forced into rehab, Morris agrees to coach a misfit softball team of recovering addicts to prove that everyone, despite their past, can hit a home run.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda
programme.desc: Jack Black is Po, the unlikely hero chosen to fulfill an ancient kung fu prophecy in this delightful animation voiced by a star-studded cast.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda 2
programme.desc: Po’s new life as The Dragon Warrior is threatened by the emergence of a formidable villain determined to conquer China and destroy Kung Fu.

programme.title: Ella Enchanted
programme.desc: Determined to gain control of her life, Ella sets off on a journey to find her fairy godmother to lift her "curse" of obedience.

programme.title: The Prestige
programme.desc: The quest for perfection drives two magicians to the very edge of sanity and morality.

programme.title: The Island
programme.desc: Lincoln Six-Echo lives in a contained facility in the mid-21st century, his rebellious curiosity leads him to uncover a terrible truth.

programme.title: Crazy Rich Asians

programme.title: Us Halftime Report
programme.desc: Halftime Report is on the front lines of CNBC's market coverage. Host CNBC’s Scott Wapner and the Street's top investors get to the heart of the action as it's happening and help set the agenda for the rest of the day.

programme.title: Us Halftime Report
programme.desc: Halftime Report is on the front lines of CNBC's market coverage. Host CNBC’s Scott Wapner and the Street's top investors get to the heart of the action as it's happening and help set the agenda for the rest of the day.

programme.title: Us The Exchange
programme.desc: CNBC’s "The Exchange" is the newsroom-based program for today’s Investor. The show focuses on in-depth reporting around the most important and interesting stories to today’s markets and investors. CNBC’s deep roster of skilled reporters, guided by anchor Kelly Evans, provide actionable information to viewers as they make daily investment decisions.

programme.title: Us The Exchange
programme.desc: CNBC’s "The Exchange" is the newsroom-based program for today’s Investor. The show focuses on in-depth reporting around the most important and interesting stories to today’s markets and investors. CNBC’s deep roster of skilled reporters, guided by anchor Kelly Evans, provide actionable information to viewers as they make daily investment decisions.

programme.title: Us Power Lunch
programme.desc: CNBC's Kelly Evans and Brian Sullivan take you through the heart of the business day bringing you the latest developments and instant analysis on the stocks and stories driving the day’s agenda. Airing CNBC’s award-winning business news coverage, "Power Lunch" delves into the economy, markets, politics, technology and more.

programme.title: Us Power Lunch
programme.desc: CNBC's Kelly Evans and Brian Sullivan take you through the heart of the business day bringing you the latest developments and instant analysis on the stocks and stories driving the day’s agenda. Airing CNBC’s award-winning business news coverage, "Power Lunch" delves into the economy, markets, politics, technology and more.

programme.title: Us Closing Bell
programme.desc: Anything can happen between the bells of the trading day. But what happens during the last hour could be what matters most. Hosted by CNBC’s Scott Wapner, "Closing Bell" guides you through the most important hour of the trading day. The show takes a close-up look at how the markets are moving, what’s driving them and how investors are reacting.

programme.title: Us Closing Bell
programme.desc: Anything can happen between the bells of the trading day. But what happens during the last hour could be what matters most. Hosted by CNBC’s Scott Wapner, "Closing Bell" guides you through the most important hour of the trading day. The show takes a close-up look at how the markets are moving, what’s driving them and how investors are reacting.

programme.title: Us Closing Bell: Overtime
programme.desc: When the bell rings, the action does not end. "Closing Bell: Overtime" takes you through all of the after-hours moves including breaking news, corporate earnings and post-market trading. Big investors, smart strategists and top money managers debate actionable ideas and the big market themes of the day, and get viewers ready for tomorrow’s trading day.

programme.title: Us Closing Bell: Overtime

programme.title: Us Fast Money
programme.desc: "Fast Money" is America’s post-market show. Hosted by Melissa Lee and a roundtable of top traders, "Fast Money" breaks through the noise of the day, to bring you the actionable news that matters most to investors.

programme.title: Us Fast Money

programme.title: U.s. Markets Edition 2025
programme.desc: U.S. Markets Edition delivers key takeaways from the most impactful interviews and insights from CNBC’s programming in the US. programme.desc: Bloomberg Balance of Power focuses on politics and policies on Capitol Hill, in President Trump's administration, the federal agencies and the courts.

programme.desc: Live from Tokyo and Sydney with Shery Ahn and Haidi Stroud-Watts, getting insight and analysis from newsmakers and industry leaders on the biggest stories shaping markets.

programme.desc: Live from London, we catch you up with overnight markets news from the US and Asia. Plus, we'll tell you what matters for investors in Europe, giving you insight before trading begins.

programme.desc: Everything you need to know as markets open across Europe. We break down today's biggest stories and speak to guests with skin in the game. Hosted by Anna Edwards, Guy Johnson and Kriti Gupta.

programme.desc: Roger Goodell, NFL Commissioner. Roger Goodell talks about NFL's international expansion, allowing private equity firms to take passive minority stakes in teams, and adding an 18th game to the season.

programme.title: Eat Around Indonesia
programme.desc: Spices have always been fulfilling most of our land and are the primary charm that makes people came here in droves from hundreds years ago. Within the various taste given by nature, Indonesia grows with many kinds of delicacies. Accompany each lives with pleasure and joy every single day. Eat Around Indonesia takes people to taste delicious foods around Indonesia. Indonesian famous culinary will be known even wider.

programme.title: Seafood
programme.desc: SEAfood will explore the culinary richness around Indonesia, delivered by narrative voice over and combined with face to face interviews with seller or the "chef".

programme.title: The New Zealanders
programme.desc: The New Zealanders is a beautifully shot series introducing us to some of the quirkiest locations and heart-warming characters throughout New Zealand.

programme.title: The Night Shift
programme.desc: A documentary program that discusses about people working at night day. What do they do, why they chose the job, as well how they deal with their lives whose cycle is reversed compared to people in general will be discussed in this program.

programme.title: Night Guard S1
programme.desc: A family run business, Night Guard is a private security firm operating in Johannesburg, South Africa, where a violent crime happens every 16 seconds. Night Guard serves the people of Johannesburg by taking on the jobs that the police can't.

programme.title: Reality Trip
programme.desc: Follow five young adults as they leave their comfortable lifestyles behind to go on the Reality Trip of a lifetime! Travelling to Sri Lanka, Bangladesh and the Phillippines, the group learn the origins of their favourite brands. From working in cotton fields under a blazing sun, to sleeping on cardboard beds alongside the factory workers; this is a world they were not prepared for. Sparks fly between the group as stress and emotions take over.

programme.title: Discover London S2
programme.desc: Discover London uncovers hidden gems, guided by an experienced London Black Taxi driver and respected 'Knowledge of London' tutor, and a youthful Londoner seeking to learn more about her city.

programme.title: Duo Backpackers
programme.desc: The journey of two travelers to magnificent hidden places across the islands of Indonesia.

programme.title: Side Walk
programme.desc: This program discusses the traditional food with its history, by bringing chefs from some restaurants / hotels that create innovations from the cuisine. Guided by a host who has experience and interest in the field of culinary specialities, Side Walk is an alternative entertainment program in the form of information on regional cuisine that has never been timeless.

programme.title: Tough Trains
programme.desc: Tough Trains takes viewers on some of the most epic and hard-core train journeys on the planet. Trips that should take hours often take days, and nights that should be spent in towns are spent aboard tough trains.

programme.title: The Longest Day
programme.desc: Climate change is more than a set of abstract projections and statistics. It's the daily reality for millions of people across the world, living on the frontlines of the climate crisis. The Longest Day is a snapshot of the climate crisis in action - told through the voices of farmers, health workers, city residents and displaced families.

programme.title: Negeri 5 Menara
programme.desc: Six best friends in the Islamic Boarding School often hang out near the mosque towers. All of them made a promise under the tower that one day, they will go to places that they have been dreaming about.

programme.title: Seafood
programme.desc: SEAfood will explore the culinary richness around Indonesia, delivered by narrative voice over and combined with face to face interviews with seller or the "chef".

programme.title: Stories Of Taste S3
programme.desc: Stories of Taste will provide a new perspective about the taste of unique cuisines across the cities in Indonesia. Take an in-depth look at the struggles and history of the owners in building and creating great food or restaurants.

programme.title: Kaya Rasa
programme.desc: A documentary program that discussesabout a journey of a chef who explores a secret ingredient in a dish.

programme.title: Hungry Hour S4
programme.desc: Street food is not just a matter of taste but also a story. Culinary recommendations that are delicious and suitable for anyone.

programme.title: Secret For A Healthy Life
programme.desc: A program that tells the inspiring story of a healthy life practitioner who has experienced a history of illness. He or she will share stories about their journey and also their secrets to fighting to heal or survive.

programme.title: Wellness Stories
programme.desc: Inspires people to relate to the emotion of the moment. Captures the wellness of life and the excitement of doing a healthy lifestyle. Spread spirit and happiness. Wellness is related to local wisdom too.

programme.title: Living In Harmony
programme.desc: Living in Harmony is a program about comfortable living homes designed according to the character of the owner. We believe that every home is ideal for its owner, hence every home has a different feel.

programme.title: Luxe Asia S2
programme.desc: Each episode focuses on a particular theme, be it homes, holidays or toys of the super-wealthy. It's Asia like you've never seen before - dripping in grandeur and extravagance, ready for anyone with deep enough pockets. Join host Anita Kapoor on a journey across the beautiful Asian continent, exploring the latest in luxury in Hong Kong, Sri Lanka, the Maldives, Singapore, Thailand, China, and Abu Dhabi.

programme.title: Teman Bicara
programme.desc: Indy Barends wants to share stories with his inspirational friends that can motivate people to be successful.

programme.title: Animalpedia
programme.desc: A program for animal lovers. Everything you need to know about each animal that will be featured in this program.

programme.title: Vet Tales
programme.desc: Follow the daily ups and downs of two enthusiastic and entertaining New Zealand veterinarians - Dr Mark Young and Dr Stacey Tremain. These long-time friends graduated vet school together 20 years ago. Mark is now a rural vet working with large animals and Stacey works in a busy animal hospital dealing with smaller patients.

programme.title: Dr Lisa To The Rescue S2
programme.desc: Emergency vet Dr. Lisa Chimes ventures out of the surgery room to raise awareness about animal welfare in this compassionate pet rescue series. Lisa's mission is to encourage potential pet owners to adopt rescue animals from shelters rather than support puppy mills or backyard breeders.

programme.title: Bonding Buddy
programme.desc: The unusual closeness between humans and their pets is unique in itself.

programme.title: Sea Today Business (Live)
programme.desc: SEA Today Business delivers up to-date news and live reports about global stock markets.

programme.title: Coastal Life
programme.desc: Coastal communities are communities that generally make a living by utilizing the sea and its contents. The challenges of life facing the sea provide unique socio-economic characteristics to coastal communities. Coastal Life talks about the lives of coastal communities in Indonesia in general. The topics of each episode include culture, harsh life, livelihoods, problems often faced, and how they survive admist the offers of modernity.

programme.title: Exploring Nusantara With Kristian Hansen
programme.desc: Showcasing spectacular journey like you've never seen it before! Join with Kristian Hansen on non-stop journey one of Asia's most exotic and breath-taking nations Indonesia. programme.title: Eat Around Indonesia
programme.desc: Spices have always been fulfilling most of our land and are the primary charm that makes people came here in droves from hundreds years ago. programme.title: The Night Shift
programme.desc: A documentary program that discusses about people working at night day. What do they do, why they chose the job, as well how they deal with their lives whose cycle is reversed compared to people in general will be discussed in this program.

programme.title: Night Guard S1
programme.desc: A family run business, Night Guard is a private security firm operating in Johannesburg, South Africa, where a violent crime happens every 16 seconds. Night Guard serves the people of Johannesburg by taking on the jobs that the police can't.

programme.title: Reality Trip
programme.desc: Follow five young adults as they leave their comfortable lifestyles behind to go on the Reality Trip of a lifetime! Travelling to Sri Lanka, Bangladesh and the Phillippines, the group learn the origins of their favourite brands. From working in cotton fields under a blazing sun, to sleeping on cardboard beds alongside the factory workers; this is a world they were not prepared for. Sparks fly between the group as stress and emotions take over.

programme.title: Discover London S2
programme.desc: Discover London uncovers hidden gems, guided by an experienced London Black Taxi driver and respected 'Knowledge of London' tutor, and a youthful Londoner seeking to learn more about her city.

programme.desc: Climate change is more than a set of abstract projections and statistics. programme.title: Luxe Asia S2

programme.title: Big Boys Club
programme.desc: Each episode of Big Boys Club invites singers, artistes as well as people from different walks of life as guests onto the show, participating in relaxed interviews and discussing current trends.

programme.title: Murder Diary - EP 17
programme.desc: This crime thriller is centered around Ip King-fung, a police officer who develops Dissociative Identity Disorder after a childhood incident. King-fung's alternate personality, Chu Kei, becomes a skilled criminal profiler, aiding King-fung in dismantling criminal organisations.

programme.title: Heavenly Hand & What's On Today - EP 3
programme.desc: The owner of a mahjong hall witnesses the changing of the times, along with his group of neighbourhood friends in Wan Chai. His peaceful life is disrupted by a girl who has the same habits as him, and a USB of unknown origin.

programme.title: Lo And Behold - EP 2609
programme.desc: Hung Shu-Kan owns a logistics business. The only thing on his mind is the well-being of his three daughters. programme.title: The Unexpected Marriage - EP 18
programme.desc: Princess Liu Chang Sheng of the Fu Yu Kingdom, faces obstacles in finding a spouse. The Emperor sends her to marry the ruthless Prince Li Jing of the Da Tang Kingdom. They embark on a comical journey to ultimately discover the true meaning of love.

programme.title: Police Station No. 7
programme.desc: WONG YING KOO (SIT KA YIN, NANCY), a jovial optimistic middle-aged woman, is always ready to offer help to others in need. She lives happily with her daughter SUEN MAN WAH (WANG, IRENE) and other members of her family. She is a good friend of her neighbour WONG CHI CHEUNG (HUI SHIU HUNG), whose son WONG KIM (NG KAI WAH, LAWRENCE) respects her and regards her as his own mother. Corruption is a major social problem of the time in Hong Kong.

programme.title: The Stew of Life
programme.desc: Upon returning from a trip with her husband NG MAN TAK (Chung King Fai), cookery teacher LO SIU LAI (Lee Sze Kei, Louise) is shocked to find that her little daughter NG CHOI NI (Chen Fala) has started cohabiting with a homosexually inclined colleague LAU TAT YAN (Hung Tin Ming) while her divorced sister LO SIU MEI (Ng Wing Mei) is seemingly caught up in a love triangle between tenant YAU KAI (Mak Cheung Ching) and her ex-husband.

programme.title: Story Of Zom-B
programme.desc: Not only people have to come up with brainy ideas, but zombies also have to engage in "eating brains" literally! Chav Yu Yeung-kwong (Matthew Ho) loses his mind and rushes to the morgue as he shockingly notices something unusual about his body. He eats a bloody human brain in front of his buddies, forensic intern Koo Tak-ming (Arnold Kwok) and doashi Wah Lun (Milkson Fong)! Since then, Yeung-kwong possesses someone else’s memory and skills when he eats their brain.

programme.title: Fistful Of Stances, A
programme.desc: AU YEUNG WAI-LAN (Yuen Qiu), owner of a martial arts training school, is reunited with her long-lost son KOO YU-CHEUNG (Kevin Cheng) after years of agonizing separation. On his return home, CHEUNG is shocked to find that his younger brother KOO YU-TONG (Ma Kwok Ming) has been critically ill and that his father was murdered long ago by WING TAK (Lam Ka Wah), the existing director of a pharmaceutical company and a bitter old foe of the KOOs.

programme.title: Golden Faith
programme.desc: BEN (LAW KA LEUNG, GALLEN) meets NAM (HSUAN JESSICA HESTER) in Australia during a business trip. When he gets back to Hong Kong, he is involved in a robbery and NAM is in charge of prosecution._x000D__x000D_ BEN’s parents died in a ship accident when he was six. His brother was never found. BEN was saved by BON (CHUN PUI). BON treats him like his own son and passes his gold shop business to him.

programme.desc: BEN (LAW KA LEUNG, GALLEN) meets NAM (HSUAN JESSICA HESTER) in Australia during a business trip. When he gets back to Hong Kong, he is involved in a robbery and NAM is in charge of prosecution._x000D__x000D_ BEN’s parents died in a ship accident when he was six. His brother was never found. BEN was saved by BON (CHUN PUI). BON treats him like his own son and passes his gold shop business to him.

programme.title: Golden Faith
programme.desc: BEN (LAW KA LEUNG, GALLEN) meets NAM (HSUAN JESSICA HESTER) in Australia during a business trip. When he gets back to Hong Kong, he is involved in a robbery and NAM is in charge of prosecution._x000D__x000D_ BEN’s parents died in a ship accident when he was six. His brother was never found. BEN was saved by BON (CHUN PUI). BON treats him like his own son and passes his gold shop business to him.

programme.title: Police Station No. 7
programme.desc: WONG YING KOO (SIT KA YIN, NANCY), a jovial optimistic middle-aged woman, is always ready to offer help to others in need. She lives happily with her daughter SUEN MAN WAH (WANG, IRENE) and other members of her family. She is a good friend of her neighbour WONG CHI CHEUNG (HUI SHIU HUNG), whose son WONG KIM (NG KAI WAH, LAWRENCE) respects her and regards her as his own mother. Corruption is a major social problem of the time in Hong Kong.

programme.title: The Stew of Life
programme.desc: Upon returning from a trip with her husband NG MAN TAK (Chung King Fai), cookery teacher LO SIU LAI (Lee Sze Kei, Louise) is shocked to find that her little daughter NG CHOI NI (Chen Fala) has started cohabiting with a homosexually inclined colleague LAU TAT YAN (Hung Tin Ming) while her divorced sister LO SIU MEI (Ng Wing Mei) is seemingly caught up in a love triangle between tenant YAU KAI (Mak Cheung Ching) and her ex-husband.

programme.title: Story Of Zom-B
programme.desc: Not only people have to come up with brainy ideas, but zombies also have to engage in "eating brains" literally! Chav Yu Yeung-kwong (Matthew Ho) loses his mind and rushes to the morgue as he shockingly notices something unusual about his body. He eats a bloody human brain in front of his buddies, forensic intern Koo Tak-ming (Arnold Kwok) and doashi Wah Lun (Milkson Fong)! Since then, Yeung-kwong possesses someone else’s memory and skills when he eats their brain.

programme.title: Fistful Of Stances, A
programme.desc: AU YEUNG WAI-LAN (Yuen Qiu), owner of a martial arts training school, is reunited with her long-lost son KOO YU-CHEUNG (Kevin Cheng) after years of agonizing separation. On his return home, CHEUNG is shocked to find that his younger brother KOO YU-TONG (Ma Kwok Ming) has been critically ill and that his father was murdered long ago by WING TAK (Lam Ka Wah), the existing director of a pharmaceutical company and a bitter old foe of the KOOs.

programme.title: Golden Faith
programme.desc: BEN (LAW KA LEUNG, GALLEN) meets NAM (HSUAN JESSICA HESTER) in Australia during a business trip. When he gets back to Hong Kong, he is involved in a robbery and NAM is in charge of prosecution._x000D__x000D_ BEN’s parents died in a ship accident when he was six. His brother was never found. BEN was saved by BON (CHUN PUI). BON treats him like his own son and passes his gold shop business to him.
